subtitle: Stochastic oscillator — position of close within recent range.

measures.how_to_read: %K/%D above 80 often overbought; below 20 oversold. Crosses imply shifts.
measures.caveats: Overlaps with RSI; pick one to avoid redundancy.

example_conditions: stochastic(period_k=14, period_d=3) crosses below 20 then above

assistant_hints: Prefer cross-through of 20/80 bands over raw levels.
Align with higher timeframe to avoid fading strong trends.
Avoid redundancy if RSI already used for the same purpose.
Smooth with %D to reduce noise on lower timeframes.
beginner_summary: Stochastic oscillator — position of close within recent range.
